text: Hi everyone, I wanted to ask if Julia could be used for Blockchain development ?

elements.text: Hi everyone, I wanted to ask if Julia could be used for Blockchain development ?

text: Sure, why not? Julia's good for it if you need high speed of development and high execution speed. It's not so good ad making guarantees about how the code behaves. So if you plan on making the next big bitcoin wallet, you might want to go with C++ or Rust

elements.text: Sure, why not? Julia's good for it if you need high speed of development and high execution speed. It's not so good ad making guarantees about how the code behaves. So if you plan on making the next big bitcoin wallet, you might want to go with C++ or Rust

text: Okay, thank you for your reply

elements.text: Okay, thank you for your reply

text: though blockchain development is more than just designing wallets or chains. there will likely be valuable uses for Julia implementations for the API of various chains and projects. For example, an interface for running Julia programs on SingularityNet.

root.text: Hi everyone, I wanted to ask if Julia could be used for Blockchain development ?

elements.text: Hi everyone, I wanted to ask if Julia could be used for Blockchain development ?

though blockchain development is more than just designing wallets or chains. there will likely be valuable uses for Julia implementations for the API of various chains and projects. For example, an interface for running Julia programs on SingularityNet.

text: Can someone please explain to me whether blockchain is actually a thing or not? All the really smart people I talk to say it's a scam. But there's so much stuff on the internet about how important it is for the future of humanity or something

elements.text: Can someone please explain to me whether blockchain is actually a thing or not? All the really smart people I talk to say it's a scam. But there's so much stuff on the internet about how important it is for the future of humanity or something

attachments.title: Blockchain, the amazing solution for almost nothing
attachments.text: Blockchain technology is going to change everything: the shipping industry, the financial system, government … in fact, what won’t it change? But enthusiasm for it mainly stems from a lack of knowledge and understanding. The blockchain is a solution in search of a problem.
attachments.fallback: The Correspondent: Blockchain, the amazing solution for almost nothing
